aws_cloudfront_origin_access_identity.description: Provides a CloudFront origin access identity.

comment.description: - An optional comment for the origin access identity.

id.description: The identifier for the distribution. For example: `EDFDVBD632BHDS5`.

caller_reference.description: Internal value used by CloudFront to allow future

cloudfront_access_identity_path.description: A shortcut to the full path for the

etag.description: The current version of the origin access identity's information.

iam_arn.description: A pre-generated ARN for use in S3 bucket policies (see below).

s3_canonical_user_id.description: The Amazon S3 canonical user ID for the origin
